content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, nice to meet you. I am sure you will find my apartment in Duisburg to your liking. Now, let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Haoyu. The apartment is in the city center, recently built, and unfurnished. It's a 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment. The price I was thinking of is €850 per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a bit steep, don't you think? I was thinking more along the lines of €600 per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Haoyu, the apartment is in the city center and it's newly built. The price I'm offering is quite reasonable considering its location and condition. Let's meet in the middle, how about €750 per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I still think that's too much. How about €650 per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Haoyu. Considering its location and condition, €650 per month sounds fair to me. Let's make it official.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Haoyu, but €650 per month is not enough for me. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too low for my satisfaction.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Haoyu. I understand where you're coming from, but I can't lower the price any further. It's already set at a reasonable rate considering its location and condition. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price cannot be lowered any further.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I see. Well, Haoyu, let's try to find a middle ground. How about €700 per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's better, but not quite there yet. Let's meet in the middle, how about €675 per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: €675 per month is acceptable to me. I agree to the price of [675] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree, Haoyu. The price of €675 per month is agreed upon. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
